descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: After a block by Bruno Fernando, Trae Young gets the ball in transition and goes behind his own back before laying the ball up and in.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae uses sweet behind-the-back move to score) 2020/12/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae uses sweet behind-the-back move to score

videos.description: Prior to the Hawks game against the Pistons, Trae Young shows off his shooting range, sinking one shot while sitting on the bench.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (From the bench or the logo, Trae Young can sink it from anywhere) 2020/12/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: From the bench or the logo, Trae Young can sink it from anywhere
